Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission out of all manuscript submission activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission that are followed by Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Number of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in variants containing SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in First Look submission paths
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Frequency of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission per case
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission that occur multiple times in the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission'

Name: Ratio of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities for cases where activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in cases that eventually reach RW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in relation to SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission that precede SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Frequency of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in major revision workflows
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in cases with multiple revision cycles
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in successful review processes
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Ratio of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission to Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in cases with extended reviewer selection
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week'

Name: Frequency of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in relation to reviewer invitation reminders
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission that occur during initial submission versus revision phases
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in high-performance variants
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities for cases where activity 'RW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in cases with SW-EIC Major Revision decisions
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission relative to manuscript export activities
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission in cases with co-author involvement during First Look updates
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'First Look-Please submit updates'

Name: Ratio of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission to total author-related account creation events
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities

Name: Percentage of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission that lead to completed review processes
Metric: Percentage of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' out of all 'RW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission grouped by revision type
Metric: Number of 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' activities
